data.eml:eml: New Jurassic Hangingflies (Insecta: Mecoptera: Bittacidae) from Inner Mongolia, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Sulin, Shih, Chungkun, Bashkuev, Alexei, Ren, Dong (2016): New Jurassic Hangingflies (Insecta: Mecoptera: Bittacidae) from Inner Mongolia, China. Zootaxa 4067 (1): 65-78, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4067.1.5
